title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements through stakeholder interviews and market research.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including data models, algorithms, and integration with external services. The architecture should consider scalability, maintainability, and performance. Identify potential data sources and APIs for socioeconomic and educational data (considering open datasets and partnerships with relevant institutions). Define the core prediction algorithms and machine learning models to be used (explain choice of specific models and their relevance to the problem). Outline the user interface and experience flow, including wireframes or mockups where possible. Provide a detailed technical plan for data processing pipelines, focusing on data privacy and security considerations.

title: Data Collection and Processing
description: Identify and acquire relevant socioeconomic, educational, and career data sources, and design data processing pipelines.

title: Predictive Modeling
description: Develop and train machine learning models to predict social mobility outcomes based on input factors.

title: User Interface Design for SocialMobilityNavigator
description: Design an intuitive, user-friendly, and accessible interface that allows users to input their information (education history, career goals, socioeconomic factors), visualize data, and receive personalized recommendations. The design should prioritize usability, accessibility, data privacy, and responsiveness across various devices. A special emphasis should be given to the mobile experience as a significant portion of our user base is expected to use the app on mobile devices.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a secure, scalable, high-performance database system to store user data, predictions, socioeconomic factors, and other relevant information. The database should support efficient data retrieval, analysis, and reporting. Ensure data privacy, compliance with GDPR and other relevant regulations, and consider potential growth of the application (for example, handling millions of users). Include features for auditing and data anonymization to further protect user data. Collaborate closely with the Data Modeling and Requirements Gathering team to ensure a well-defined schema and efficient queries.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Implement robust security measures and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute thorough testing to ensure the application's reliability and accuracy.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and automate the deployment process for the application.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for users, developers, and administrators, and establish support channels.
